a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: National poverty line vs. mean daily income or consumption, 2017
This data is adjusted for inflation and for differences in the cost of living between countries.
Data source: Jolliffe et al. (2022); World Bank Poverty and Inequality Platform (2024)
Note: This data is expressed in international-$ at 2017 prices.
